name: Clin N
title: Clinical N
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field. Distant nodes are coded in distant metastasis. 

**Note 2:**  Periaortic and pericaval lymph nodes are classified as regional nodes for TNM staging. They are now coded in regional lymph nodes.
footnotes: *N2 is not defined by UICC in the 7th edition. Approval has been provided by UICC to use âMetastasis to periaortic, pericaval, superior mesenteric artery, and/or celiac artery lymph nodesâ as N2.
